data.name: textBox1.Text
data.value:
Terms and Conditions Last updated: 18/05/2024 Welcome to OOP CALCULATOR!
These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of the App OOP Calculator.
By accessing or using the App, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the App.
1. Use of the App The App is designed to perform mathematical calculations and store certain user information to enhance user experience. By using the App, you warrant that you will not use it for any unlawful or prohibited activities.
2. User Information 2.1 Data Collection The App may collect the following types of information:
Personal identification information (e.g., name, email address) Usage data (e.g., calculation history, preferences) Device information (e.g., device type, operating system) 2.2 Use of Information The collected information may be used for the following purposes:
To personalize the user experience To improve the App’s functionality and user interface To send periodic emails regarding updates, news, or promotions 2.3 Data Storage User information is stored securely on our servers or on a third-party service provider's servers. We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information.
2.4 Data Sharing We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties except for the following:
Trusted third parties who assist us in operating our App, conducting our business, or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. When required by law or to protect our or others' rights, property, or safety. 3. User Responsibilities You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to immediately notify us of any unauthorized use of your account or any other breach of security.
4. Intellectual Property The App and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of our company and its licensors. The App is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws of both Spain and foreign countries.
5. Termination We may terminate or suspend access to our App immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the App will cease immediately.
6. Governing Law These terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of Spain, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
7. Changes to Terms and Conditions We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will provide at least [30 days' notice] prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion.
